body:
superseeds https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/7612
fixes https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8669

p.s. it's not clear why this happens, but in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8669 and https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/7612 , IMO, we are consistent in that 5.1.0 **can** be built with older GCC (i.e. 4.8.5) whereas 5.2.0 **can not**. Thus this PR. To be fair, I only care about constraint which represent the observation of numerous users, why this happens is another story.

FYI @briedel @Oximore @adamjstewart
title: suite-sparse: add GCC version constraint
